amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 116-334 to to authorize a pilot program to develop, expand, and enhance the commercialization of biomedical products, and for other purposes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 116-334 to to authorize a pilot program to develop, expand, and enhance the commercialization of biomedical products, and for other purposes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Peters.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
